snippet.title: Three Bulky Bears Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The evil witch Rolldilocks has kicked the three bears out of their home! Time to get back and kick her out! In this 2D platformer, switch between Baby Bear, Mama Bear, and Papa Bear to navigate a variety of obstacles, as you roll, jump, swim, and smash your way through dozens of challenging levels!

Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2957270/Three_Bulky_Bears/

And join our discord server to keep up with development and get access to playtests!
https://discord.gg/TRwkVhHWc5
